summary: **Grand Theft Auto: Vice City** is a popular video game from 2002. You play as Tommy Vercetti, a mobster who gets out of prison and tries to take over the fictional city of Vice City (based on Miami). The game lets you explore the city, drive vehicles, and complete missions to build Tommy's criminal empire. It received high praise for its music, gameplay, and story but also caused controversy due to its violence and portrayal of different groups. Despite this, it sold very well and is considered one of the best games of its time.
title: Grand Theft Auto Vice City
